page.title: 07Mine Workings.
page.content: The block is littered with old mine workings many of which are now being made safe by the County Council (the area around the field centre was extensively repaired in 1983).Although many of the signs of these activities remain especially at the bigger mines such as at Gritt Hill and Roman Gravels others which we now existed are more difficult to find as nature reclaims the land. It is a popular spot for geology students as well as for schoolchildren from the County who come looking for samples of quartz crystal and galena which are easily found.
